Articles.Content: So now that we have better water we might as well have better looking water. I'm just saying like that mod that everyone has(except me because #4gb ram) and also water contracts are needed. Maybe like get science data from the surface of the water in area X. Also have things like rescue Butcher Kerman and Al Kerman from a boat on kerbin. And add things like test a part skimming the water. And please make the advanced grabbing units grab the dirt on kerbin. And also make ore be present in oceans.

Define better water... If you mean something like the Scatterer Ocean Shaders, then I don't think Squad will do that due to performance issues, but with the Unity 5 upgrade new water might be possible. 

You might also want to elaborate on your suggestions, if you want them, sell them.

Make it look appealing so others might want them.

Happy Flying

YargJay9991

What I'd like to be able to do with water is produce LFO, or just O2 (Life support).
A small electrolyzer part to replace the drills would do.  That way I can produce fuel while exploring the oceans of at least Kerbin/Eve.
How to determine if it can be processed ?  I would say go with Density.
